refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Some documents, usually legacy documents, use headings that are not tied to the normal sectional hieararchy. These headings may be represented in DocBook with the bridgehead element.
A bridgehead may also be useful in fiction or journalistic works that don't have a nested hierarchy.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A bridgehead is formatted as a block, using the same display properties as the section heading which it masquerades as. The renderas attribute controls which heading it mimics.
